alert.note: Alert for Badlands Area; Bennett County Area; Haakon County Area (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 07 at 3:00AM MST until November 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT THIS MORNING THOUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA AND PORTIONS OF SOUTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA... .DISCUSSION...South winds will increase this morning and continue through this afternoon with gusts of 40 to 50 mph. Relative humidity will drop to around 20 percent this afternoon. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 331, 332, AND 333... The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 331 Haakon County Area, 332 Badlands Area and 333 Bennett County Area. * WINDS...Southeast 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 22 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Badlands Area; Bennett County Area; Haakon County Area
